title: What is the essence of the Forum
author: 达斯·龙须
txt_content: What is the essence of the Forum?Open forum, can not see a few meaningful posts!Even if some of the posts have meaning, but the 'water' stick Everfount, like flood engulfed the posts list.Post Bar and forum is different, at least for me ...Although MCBBS has a teahouse, may be meaningless postings is really too much, too much

replies.author: 840196733mw
replies.txt_content: 看不懂，你不也是在水吗（翻译软件真好用）

replies.author: 一剑飘香

replies.txt_content:
一剑飘香 发表于 2015-2-6 13:36
翻译过来是：
正文：论坛的本质是什么?开放论坛,看不见几个有意义的帖子!即使一些有意义的文章,但是“水” ...
有些地方不对
